text: Rossana Di Lorenzo (4 March 1938 â€“ 13 August 2022) was an Italian actress. Her best known roles were in Le coppie, Il comune senso del pudore and Le Bal. Lorenzo died on 13 August 2022 in Rome, Italy at the age of 84.Morta l'attrice Rossana Di Lorenzo.
